Package net.sf.freecol.common.model

Class Monarch.Force

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.model.Monarch.Force
  • Enclosing class:
    Monarch

    public class Monarch.Force
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of units with a common origin and purpose.
